derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'clean out (dirt'): back-formation from scavenger

entry.def: If people or animals scavenge for things, they collect them by searching among waste or unwanted objects.

example.ex: Many are orphans, their parents killed as they scavenged for food...
